title: Human-Centered Engineering Design Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental principles of engineering design and understanding of elementary education settings
context.additional_context: Experiencing human-centered design processes through community-linked or classroom-based projects, conceptualizing and articulating the design process through reflective practice activities

learning_goals: Learners can plan and execute projects that solve real-world problems in elementary education settings using human-centered design methodologies.
Learners analyze their own design processes and derive improvement directions through reflective practice activities (e.g., design journaling, feedback sessions).
Learners compare and evaluate the differences and pros/cons of human-centered design approaches based on the presence or absence of community partnerships.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
